uk.ac.ox.cs.diadem.oxpath.output

Interface IAbstractOutputHandler

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    IOutputHandler
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AAdvancedCustomOutputHandler, ACustomOutputHandler, HierarchyCSVOutputHandler, HierarchyJDBCOutputHandler, JsonOutputHandler, NodeOutputHandler, OutputHandlerRouter, RecStreamCSVOutputHandler, RecStreamJDBCOutputHandler, RecStreamOutputHandler, RelationOutputHandler, SimpleConsoleOutputHandler, XMLOutputHandler

    public interface IAbstractOutputHandler
    Abstract output handler provided to the OXPath interpreter.
    Author:
    Ruslan Fayzrakhmanov 8 Feb 2017

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean hasOuterException() 
      void processNode(OXPathExtractionNode node)
      The OXPath engine invokes this method to output extraction nodes.
      void receiveOuterException(Throwable e)
      This method is called by the OXPath engine if the exception affecting the output has been received.

    • Method Detail

      • processNode

        void processNode(OXPathExtractionNode node)
        The OXPath engine invokes this method to output extraction nodes. The first node is <result> node, the root. The last node is the "end node".
        Parameters:
        node -

      • receiveOuterException

        void receiveOuterException(Throwable e)
        This method is called by the OXPath engine if the exception affecting the output has been received.
        Parameters:
        e -

        boolean hasOuterException()
